User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Familienplaner application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: The email address of the user.

familyName.description: The name of the family this user belongs to.

CalendarEvent.title: CalendarEvent
CalendarEvent.description: Represents an event in the calendar.

start.description: The start time of the event.

end.description: The end time of the event.

allDay.description: Indicates if the event is an all-day event.

locationId.description: Reference to Location. The location of the event.

participants.description: References to Users. The users who are attending the event.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task assigned to a user.

dueDate.description: The due date of the task.

priority.description: The priority level of the task (e.g., high, medium, low).

assignedTo.description: Reference to User. The user to whom the task is assigned.

completed.description: Indicates whether the task is completed.

visibility.description: Determines who can see the task.

addedBy.description: Reference to User. The user who created the task.

ShoppingListItem.title: ShoppingListItem
ShoppingListItem.description: Represents an item on the shopping list.

addedBy.description: Reference to User. The user who added the item to the list.

purchased.description: Indicates whether the item has been purchased.

assignedTo.description: Reference to User. The user who has taken responsibility for purchasing the item.

DogPlanItem.title: DogPlanItem
DogPlanItem.description: Represents an item in the dog plan.

/families/{familyName}/events/{eventId}.description: Stores calendar events for each family.

/families/{familyName}/shoppingListItems.description: Stores shopping list items for each family.

/families/{familyName}/dogPlan/{dogPlanI.description: Stores dog plan items for each family.

/families/{familyName}/locations/{locati.description: Stores reusable locations for a family.
